creator: jochen.stiepel@dresdner-bank.com
text:
It would be nice to have a option to select the language, maybe english or 
german. 
Because I see the German titles, but sometimes I need the English.

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
I've added menu options for all the supported languages.  For most things, it
works.  However, some GUI components are too clever and create one-time static
values for resource strings instead of grabbing them every time the object is
created.  I will fix these as I run into them.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
